Name: Fedora Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: As David says of his drink, "Much like its namesake garment, this cocktail is simultaneously sharp and smooth; and whilst it's rather cool, it's also likely to keep your head warm."
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by David Langley at the Boilermaker in Nottingham, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Fedora Sour contains 199 calories
